text: right Flight of the Stag is a 1981 role-playing game adventure published by Marischal Adventures for Traveller. ==Contents== Flight of the Stag is the first of Marishcal's folio adventures, and deals with the exploits of the Gazelle-class close escort Stag during the Fifth Frontier War. ==Reception== William A. Barton reviewed Flight of the Stag in The Space Gamer No. 46. Barton commented that "I highly recommend Flight of the Stag as an excellent example of a brief, simple, yet highly playable adventure for Traveller." ==Reviews== *Different Worlds #18 (Jan., 1982) ==References== Category:Traveller (role-playing game) adventures
